name: Hawthorn Lodge Guest House

reviews.title: Do Not Stay Here..They Gave Our Room Away..............
reviews.text: Booked to stay for one night on 9TH JUNE 2011.Booked 4 weeks in advance and paid upfront.Upon arrival at the hotel an 9th June we were told they were fully booked with no rooms left.When i pointed out i had a reservation and had paid in advance and had the email conformation in my possession stating the booking,also that we had been allocated room 3.There was confusion with the staff and a few calls were made and we were treated terribly.To sumerise they had given our room away to someone else even though we had BOOKED and PAID in ADVANCE 4 WEEKS before.This left us with no accomodation,late on a thu night the day before Rockness........Please dont stay here,they dont deserve your custom after the way we were treated.....Shocking.....
Stayed here with 2 friends to visit Inverness and Loch Ness.
reviews.title: Great place to stay in Inverness

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is a nice walk from the train station, around 10/15 minutes. We had luggage and managed fine. The directions were spot on we got there with no trouble.
reviews.title: come here

reviews.text: It is located in a residential area on the other side of River Ness, lots of other B&Bs around.
reviews.title: Friendly family run guest house, a real Scottish welcome!

aka: Hawthorn Lodge Guest House Inverness, Scotland
description: We are situated only minutes walk from the river ness and town centre. We have secure private parking, and accept credit cards.
